description: An angelonia (Angelonia angustifolia SERENA MIXTURE) is an amazing plant species. It has stunningly vibrant colors, including pink, purple, blue, and white. It is drought-tolerant and low-maintenance, blossoming robustly even in the warmest of climates. Its stems are strong and upright, with no need for staking, and its masses of sweetly smelling flowers will attract butterflies, hummingbirds, and other pollinators. Best of all, it blooms continuously from summer through fall, and will make any garden truly eye-catching!
